bibl.title: P. Köln XI 431: A Further Note.
bibl.note: P. Köln XI, 431 (= M.-P.3 1965.44). Complement to: Christopher COLLARD, P. Köln XI 431 and its 'Genre': a Suggestion, ibidem, pp. 9-14. - "The present note suggests, purely as a ballon d'essai, that each line, from alpha to omega, refers to the corresponding book of the Iliad, from 1 to 24."
PARSONS Peter, P. Köln XI 431: A Further Note.
